scripts.start:dev: set REACT_APP_PROXY=http://localhost:3001&& concurrently "npm run start:backend-dev" "npm run start:frontend-dev"
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start: export PORT=8080&& set REACT_APP_PROXY=http://localhost:8080&& npm install && concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend"
